org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Class SwingBoundReactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorBase
        • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ThreadBoundReactor
          • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.SwingBoundReactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, Blade, SwingBoundBlade, ThreadBoundBlade, Closeable, CommonReactor, Reactor

    @GwtIncompatible
public class SwingBoundReactor
extends ThreadBoundReactor
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener, SwingBoundBlade
    A reactor which processes requests/responses on the Swing UI thread.

    Requests/responses are processed one at a time in the order received, except that requests/responses from the same reactor are given preference.

    Requests/responses destined to a different reactor are held until all incoming messages have been processed.
